st augustine event catering
Proudly Catering St. Augustine
& All Surrounding Areas!
We specialize in bringing you amazing food for catered events for corporate, boat charters, weddings, private events, cocktail parties and more. If you need catering in St. Augustine for your event, Hurricane Patty's delivers exceptional, creative menus every time.
Customizable Menus Tailored to Your Budget

group parties & private events
Group Parties on the Waterfront
Looking for the perfect venue to host your private party or special event? Our waterfront location provides a stunning backdrop, with space to accommodate groups of 20 to 200.
Whether you’re planning a casual cocktail party with an appetizer buffet or an elegant sit-down dinner featuring a personalized multi-course menu, we have everything you need. At Hurricane Patty's, we make every event seamless, memorable, and tailored just for you!
No Room Rental Fees!

Fresh Seafood on the Waterfront.
Make a reservation

welcome to hurricane patty's
Waterfront dining featuring the freshest seafood, award-winning signature cocktails, and a deep connection to the rich history of Florida’s First Coast.
Shrimping is what shaped St. Augustine, Florida—from our local culture to the local flavor. As the largest shrimp port on the East coast, St. Augustine was also known as the largest producer of fishing vessels in the world. For decades, St. Augustine has supported the shrimpers, boat builders, and fisherman who called this port their home.
Hurricane Patty’s Waterfront Bar & Grill has been retrofitted in a 1920s historic fish house where fresh shrimp and fish were cleaned before they made their way to market. Later, shrimp boats were crafted here, too, built and balanced on railroad tracks until construction was finished and they were “rolled” -into into what the locals called “Oyster Creek.”.
Here at Hurricane Patty’s we pay homage to our local and historic heritage. Today, we’re proud to be serving the freshest and finest seafood we can get our hands on, local if possible. Our warm and welcoming staff will make you feel right at home and our killer
award-winning cocktails
, like the Hurricane Category 5 or  Playing-it-Safe Datil Smoothie. They will hit the spot and make you feel like you’re always on Florida time.
Join us for live music by the water, oysters on the half-shell, our weekend Bloody Mary Bar, or an Open Mic night every Sunday. We’re always serving up daily specials and fresh seafood like our Coconut Rum Shrimp, Olde English Fish & Chips, Scallops, Lobster, or Grouper, in addition to salads, pastas, grilled meats, and our world-renowned appetizers that are bound to knock your socks off.
Oh! And, we hope you’re not afraid of ghosts—cause we’ve got one. Rumor has it, our restaurant is haunted. She’s a heartbroken woman still pining for her lover who never returned from sea. Can you hear her crying? Stop by and you may feel her sadness or even hear her slam the bathroom door...!
